events.name: EML30 Music Festival
events.description:
MUSIC // PANELS // EXHIBITION // HANDS-ON

This December, Singapore’s local electronic music trailblazers will convene at the bustling rooftop of Lepark (People’s Park Complex) to celebrate 30 years of electronic music in Singapore with Electronic Music Lab. 

For the first time ever, catch industry leaders Jeff Hue from live electronic band Canvas Conversations, audio-visual collective Syndicate SG, together with varsity institutions RP’s EMP, SMU’s Stereometa, SUTD Scratch, in our masterclass panel sessions.

Featuring original electronic music performances by our artists, such as Ocean's Children, The Kids with Laptops, Mitch Advent Music, nanowander, Brannlum spanning a multitude of genres accompanied by stunning visuals.

Be sure to enjoy the delicious food and tasteful craft beers at the festival by the hip diner Lepark.

---

TICKET PRICES:

EML Starter Pack  - FREE
Starter Pack to receive a EML Wristband and Sticker (Includes RSVP)

EML Silver Pack - $29.95
Exclusive EML30 T-Shirt (Pre-Order Only) and EML Starter Pack (Wristband + Stickers)

EML Gold Pack - $111.95
Exclusive EML30 T-Shirt (Pre-Order Only), EML T-Shirt, EML Drawstring Bag, EML Starter Pack, EML Albums and Cassette Tapes

events.name: tutorial: Developing and testing a simple JSON service in Haskell
events.description: The tutorial session focuses on testing Haskell code. It covers the following topics: • Introduction to Hspec (a testing framework for Haskell) • Test-driven development (TDD) • Developing and testing a simple web service with Scotty (a Sinatra-like web framework for Haskell) The tutorial session is suitable for beginners and intermediate/advanced Haskell programmers who are interested in getting a hands-on introduction to testing with Hspec.
events.location: Hackerspace.SG, 344B King George's Ave, King George's Building, Singapore
